programme.title: Unikitty
programme.desc: When Unikitty and Hawkodile become stranded on a raft together, all Hawkodile's survival skills fall apart, while Unikitty's fun approach works great!

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger brings home a kitten that she will foster.

programme.title: Lamput

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings open a nightclub with blasting music and a disco ball in an igloo they have built not far from the cabin. The noise prevents Grizzy from sleeping.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Beyblade X

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: While visiting the lake, Buttercup vows to capture a legendary uncatchable crawdad.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: After Clarence and his indecisive classmate Brady are left behind at school, Brady is forced to tag along on Clarence's adventure home.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Beast Boy and Cyborg insist on hiring a clown for a Titans' party, even though Robin tells them that clowns are for little kids.

programme.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom’s tried everything to get rid of his hiccups.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Daffy causes trouble at the library and Porky the librarian tries to keep him quiet

programme.title: Tiny Toons Looniversity
programme.desc: It’s the first day at Acme Looniversity, where we find Babs and Buster Bunny as they meet new friends- tough gal Sweetie Bird, kind Hamton J. Pig, and narcissist Plucky Duck who are all kicking off their dreams to become professional toons.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: When Gumball refuses to forward a scare email, the curse becomes all too real.

programme.title: Chowder

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Mordecai and Rigby decide to make prank phone calls. They try to prank the Master Prank Caller numerous times, although they fail to fool him (and only make him increasingly annoyed).

programme.title: Chowder

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home – until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they’ve made over the kids’ rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Meet Ty Rux and his buddy Revvit as they join forces with the giant Dinotrux team that are half dinosaur, half construction truck and full-on fun!

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: It's the Lunar New Year and Odlulu has accidentally brought a stone dragon to life! Wally and Wenda work with local siblings Li and Liu, members of a dragon dance team, to tame the dragon and keep the celebration from being ruined.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has spotted an exciting new thing in the jungle. What could it be? As they try to get close to the "flappy fly", Raa Raa discovers that some situations call for absolute quiet… not something our noisy little lion is very good at!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: All the toys are ready to start the exciting DareDale Challenge race, which culminates in the competitors successfully completing the Crystal Memory Game in the DareDale Caves. Before the race can start everyone is disappointed to discover that the Crystal Memory Game has been broken. Whilst Clockwork Mouse gets the game mended, Noddy must investigate who broke the game so that they don't break it again. Using his investigating skills in questioning, gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet and thinking, Noddy discovers that Deltoid accidentally broke the game when he was trying to memorise the crystal sorting sequence. Clever Noddy helps Deltoid remember the sequence by remembering the shapes and they are able to finish the game together. Case Closed!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Primrose can't make her garden grow and turns to Fifi for advice. She is amazed when Fifi points out that you need to water and weed a garden. And surely she can't really mean putting that yucky compost everywhere can she?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelp’s unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: Iron Squad 2
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean military survival show brings eight Special Force units together to compete in extreme missions that will test their physical stamina, mental strength and teamwork. programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Facing the Mediterranean Sea, Menton, a city in France, is famous for its mild subtropical climate and celebrated for its delicious lemons. The townscape also still retains its 13th century charm.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: German urbanist Chris Dimmer focuses on the community-building potential of Japan's public bathhouses, or "Sento." He hopes that people living alone can rediscover the value of these bathhouses.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Based in South Korea and Japan, Kim Insook highlights diverse individuals through photography and video. She interacts with her subjects while looking beyond the labels society has given them.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet two foreigners in Tokyo. Former amateur champion dancer Daga Rutkowska from Poland trains with a para-athlete for a blind dance competition, and Chinese Zhang Ye works for a literary agency.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Time-lapse Japan
programme.desc: The Jomon period dates roughly from 13,000 to 300 BC. We examine various aspects of Jomon society, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: Lacquer.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: What does it take to survive a flood? Japan has developed survival skills for floods through experiences such as typhoons. Find out how to safely navigate flooded streets and escape sinking cars.

programme.title: Magical Japanese "Kimono"
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to kimono. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #36 From what time to what time can we use the bath? / To ask when something is open or available, put "wa" after the name of something, then "nan-ji kara nan-ji made desu ka."

programme.title: Sing for Ukraine, Sing for Peace
programme.desc: Ukrainian musician Kateryna gives concerts all around Japan playing the bandura. Russia's invasion prompted her to support displaced people in Japan, hoping her music will bring peace to her homeland.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: This time, we introduce changes starting in April, including the extension of "NHK NEWSLINE" and the launch of "NHK NEWS 7." We also feature "Japan in Focus" moving to weekdays.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.desc: This episode features business models designed to help Japan's hikikomori (individuals who have withdrawn from society) to socialize, learn, and even find employment.

programme.title: Summer Camp I / Summer Camp II
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama have announced to their dear barbababies that they are going on a trip to Easter Island. // The Barbababies, the twins, and Mr. Strict set sail on "Thésée", a magnificent sailboat.

programme.title: Paddington's Earth Day Mission / Paddington's Special Spring Harvest Celebration
programme.desc: It'd Earth Day and Paddington has the important job of planting a tree, but will he find the perfect spot before it is too late? // Baaz holds a Spring Harvest Festival, and everyone enjoys bringing their own celebration along.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road
programme.desc: The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Tres Leches Trouble / Wizzle Wozzle Woo
programme.desc: Dora, Boots, and Benny have to trek through the rainforest to deliver a big, delicate tres leches cake to Benny's abuela. // Dora and the Fiesta Trio investigate a loud, strange noise that caused them to lose their instruments.

programme.title: Snow Day Showdown
programme.desc: It's a snowy day in Axle City, and every truck in town is lining up for a delicious winter warm-up: hot chocolate! But when Crusher tries to take all the hot chocolate for himself, Blaze is in hot pursuit to get it back!

programme.title: Nopales Tacos / Sloppy Joes
programme.desc: Accepting a knightly quest, Sir Chef sets out to turn a prickly pear cactus into nopales. // When Chef is gifted a brand new apron, he vows to keep it clean. But keeping clean isn't easy when sloppy joes are the dish of the day.

programme.title: The Party Animal
programme.desc: When Sharkdog accidentally destroys the boardwalk, Max and Sharkpack must prove to everyone that Sharkdog is a really great pet.

programme.title: Working Like a Sharkdog
programme.desc: All Sharkdog wants to do is play with his new toy, but when Dad ends up on a wild adventure through town, Sharkdog must give up his playtime and come to Dad's rescue.

programme.title: Sharkdog's Got Talent
programme.desc: Sharkdog wants to perform in the talent show with Max, but all Max wants to do is chill. Will Sharkdog perform with one of Max's friends instead?

programme.title: Shadowland / Medievel Tides
programme.desc: Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Hotel Shark
programme.desc: When William becomes moody and distant during an epic sleepover, Detective Baby Shark sets out to learn why.

programme.title: Pups and the Lighthouse Boogie / Pups Save Ryder
programme.desc: Mayor Goodway and Alex row out into the bay to get a closer look at a baby whale. But a storm blows the rowboat towards the sea. // Ryder discovers Garby the goat stuck on a cliff edge! He attempts to rescue Garby but gets stranded!

programme.title: Pups Save a Class Pet
programme.desc: Mayor Goodway is left in charge of a class pet, but the hamster escapes! Now it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet.

programme.title: The Crew Fixes The Talent Show Stage / The Crew Builds Instruments
programme.desc: When Speed Meister sabotages the stage for the town Talent Show, the pups use Motor's talent to save the day. // Sierra Sparkle is coming to sing for Builder Cove Day! But when the band's instruments break, Rubble & Crew have a construction solution.

programme.title: Grandpa's Little Train
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train called “Gertrude” and he takes Peppa and George for a ride. Along the way they meet their friends and they all hop aboard. Peppa and George think that “Gertrude” is the very best train in the whole world

programme.title: Pancakes
programme.desc: Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Babysitting
programme.desc: Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: Ballet Lesson
programme.desc: Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: A Longchair for Ron

programme.title: Tusong Twosome
programme.desc: When a promdi and a swindler's path accidentally crossed, the chemistry was undeniable. Unknown to them, that initial meeting was just the beginning of a lot of adventure together.

programme.title: Magkapatid
programme.desc: Cita (Sharon Cuneta) and Lisa (Judy Ann Santos) are not just sisters but the best of friends. When a tragedy hits the family, the ideal relationship turns into an ordeal.

programme.title: Paano Kita Iibigin
programme.desc: Fired from her job, Martee (Regine Velasquez) brings herself and her son to Zambales for a vacation. In a dilapidated resort owned by Lance (Piolo Pascual), Martee finds work as a manager.

programme.title: Ginto't Pilak
programme.desc: Ben (Rudy Fernandez) and Dina (Rosanna Roces) are partners. Their crime: extorting money from filthy rich dirty old men who can't seem to control their libido. But one day, their usually smooth operation takes a sudden turn when Dina meets Tanaka, a Japanese yakuza.

programme.title: Instant Daddy
programme.desc: Valentin Roxas (Jerald Napoles) raises a baby left behind in his cab as his own daughter. But his life takes a sharp turn when the birth mother resurfaces.

programme.title: Barumbadings
programme.desc: Three gay gangsters mourn the death of their gay guardian, but end up celebrating his bright and colorful life.

programme.title: Unlucky Plaza
programme.desc: Father. Restaurateur. Hostage taker. How did one man's financial woes spiral into a harrowing crisis that captivated the world?

programme.title: A Secret Affair
programme.desc: How will this love triangle sort itself? A Secret Affair tackles the theme about lies, temptations and rules in a relationship.

programme.title: Binhi
programme.desc: Daniel (Joem Bascon) and Cynthia (Mercedes Cabral), a young couple with a child on the way, head back to Baguio to start over again. Everything seems to be falling into place for them - or so they think - until strange things start to happen in their house.

programme.title: Love The Way U Lie
programme.desc: With the help of a spunky, lonely-in-love psychic, a deceased wife tries to get her grieving husband to move on. In the process, sparks begin to fly.

programme.title: Kulimlim
programme.desc: The past has come to haunt Jake Cabrera. Based on technicality, the Supreme Court has ordered the release of the three men convicted of raping his wife after eight years in prison. Jake decides to render his own brand of justice and seeks the help of a retired colonel. This is Robin Padilla's finest dramatic performance yet.

programme.title: Akin Ang Labang Ito
programme.desc: Dario rescues a powerful syndicate head, Don Manolo, from an assassination attempt. Meanwhile, Carlo discovers the Don's business in drugs and he tries to quit.

programme.title: The Mall, The Merrier
programme.desc: Two siblings, Moira (Vice Ganda) and Morissette (Anne Curtis), feud over Tamol Mall, a mall they inherited. The feud is compounded with the arrival of their Aunt Moody.

programme.title: The Scorpion King 4: Quest For Power
programme.desc: Set in ancient Eastern Europe, legendary warrior Mathayus is betrayed by his pupil. In a race against time, Mathayus must defeat this adversary in time to find a treasure holding the powerto rule the world.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: The Karate Kid

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: Curvature

programme.title: Don't Breathe

programme.desc: Trapped in an abandoned house, a young man desperately searches for clues about his trapped situation. The unsettling truth actually lies in a sequence of viral videos and they gradually corrupt his mind…

programme.title: Nuuk

programme.title: After
programme.desc: When two survivors of a bus crash awake to discover that they are the only people left in the town, they must work together to unveil the truth behind their isolation. As terrifying events unfold, nothing really is as it seems…

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: Two housemaids and a driver take shelter at their employer's mansion when a zombie outbreak happens one night. Can they all survive the night?

programme.title: No. 82 Haunted House

Since then, Mu's house is haunted by a series of terrifying incidents, and the family's secrets are gradually unveiled when Mu’s youngest daughter return home from abroad with her boyfriend.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady

She can only find companionship in her cleaning lady Shelly, a mysterious girl whose face is scarred by burns. As they become closer, Alice accidentally discovers Shelly's dark history and is soon embroiled in a horrific act of revenge.

programme.title: Get in the Dark

Miss Qiao had died in vain then, and her butler paid a paper craftsman to make a paper doll to be buried with her. Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.title: Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Rallye Monte-Carlo Historique 2025
programme.desc: A look back at the 27th edition of the Historical Monte-Carlo Rally, which took place between 29 January and 5 February 2025, a competition reserved for cars that took part in previous editions of the Monte-Carlo Automobile Rally.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: Twice a year, the equinoxes create exceptional tidal ranges that draw impressive crowds. Particularly popular, Saint Malo is home to the world's most impressive tides, and all the more so during the equinoxes. To better understand the phenomenon, Sophie Ladame meets geologist Odile Guérin under the full moon.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Belle Vie
programme.desc: Julien joins Vale and Alex, the nomadic pair behind the YouTube channel Prêts pour la Route, ready to head off and discover Grand Manan Island. We discover their lives as content creators living in their 7m² caravan.

programme.title: Quand L'afrique Sauva La France
programme.desc: 1940. When de Gaulle called on the French to join him he hardly imagined that he would be leading the struggle to liberate France from the heart of black Africa. Brazzaville became the capital of Free France. In these mobilised colonies, an immense desire for independence was coming to life.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Papilles
programme.desc: Emmanuel Renaut is a competitor at heart: a three-star chef and Meilleur Ouvrier de France, this workaholic never stops. From the Aiguille du Midi in Haute-Savoie to the Vallée de Joux in Switzerland, via Megève and Chamonix, we'll be tasting his mountain cuisine with him.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Belle Vie

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Les Souvenirs De Mamette
programme.desc: Today a friendly 80-year-old grandmother, Mamette was once a headstrong young girl. At the age of nine, she discovered country life with no Internet or mobile phone. A great opportunity for plenty of adventures with her friends, when not taking part in the harvest or rearing goats!

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Foot Go
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux
programme.desc: Alix would really love to feature in the story Big Boss is busy writing. Whilst she's trying to think what she could do that would be worth writing about, Hatter and Hare are making one blunder after another.

programme.title: Papilles

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion

programme.desc: October 1995. The body of 26 year-old student Sébastien Faisant is discovered in a field in Montagnat, Rhône-Alpes. The only clue for the police: a few days earlier he had used the ''Minitel Rose'', an erotic chat service, to contact a libertine couple. Gradually, the investigators discovered a demonic duo.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes
programme.desc: Italy is divided between the favoured North and more precarious South. Its ageing population and the migration problems it is facing add to a unique political history. We look back at events and the phenomenon of Georgia Meloni, who is reviving a form of Italian neo-nationalism.

programme.title: Le Voile Bleu
programme.desc: After losing her husband and baby during World War I, Louise decides to devote her life to caring for the children of others as nanny and governess. Many years later, thanks to one of these children, she meets up again with all the children she raised over a Christmas meal.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents
programme.desc: The family is working hard to prepare a surprise for François on his birthday. Meanwhile, Jean-Pierre and Rollande are trying out social media. They're surprised just how fast their posts become the buzz of the town and how aggressive some people's comments are.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents
programme.desc: After two conferences have been cancelled at her hotel in Quebec, Stéphanie invites the Morency family for a relaxing weekend. But the Morency family isn't exactly known for their discretion...

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents
programme.desc: François agrees to attend a special men-only evening in order to get to know Stéphanie's father better. He also agrees to present a telethon, with his parents acting as switchboard operators.

programme.title: Alfred Et Lucie Dreyfus, Je T'Embrasse Comme Je T'aime
programme.desc: December 1894. Captain Dreyfus is sentenced to deportation for high treason. Lucie, his wife, agrees a pact with him: stay alive, whatever it takes, whilst awaiting rehabilitation. For five long years the couple exchanged hundreds of letters which were opened, analysed and censored by the French authorities.

programme.title: Crazy Romance
programme.desc: Two co-workers navigate their feelings for each other through a minefield of office gossip and social media.

programme.title: Smugglers
programme.desc: The haenyeos are having trouble with collecting seafood under water because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they started doing smuggling business...

programme.title: The Negotiation
programme.desc: An arms dealer kidnapped two Koreans in Bangkok where the hostages were in fact held in an abandoned children's home in South Korea, when the kidnapper's motivations becomes clearer.

programme.title: Race To Freedom: Um Bok Dong
programme.desc: K-pop star Rain portrays Um Bok-dong, an unlikely hero in a government-organized bicycle race during the Japanese colonial era. Defeating Japanese rivals, his victories inspire locals and resistance fighters.

programme.title: The Attorney
programme.desc: When tax attorney Song Woo-Suk agrees to defend a student activist who was arrested and tortured into giving a false confession, his entire life and worldview begin to change drastically.

programme.desc: After an accident, Jang Bong-hwan finds himself transported back in time to the Joseon dynasty, trapped in the body of Queen Cheo-rin, wife to King Cheol-jong, the reigning monarch of that period.

programme.desc: An intriguing drama about criss-crossed relationships. The people who were loving, using and losing each other.

programme.title: Minsan Pa (Kahit Konting Pagtingin Part 2) (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The sequel to the first blockbuster team-up of FPJ and Sharon Cuneta in "Kahit Konting Pagtingin". This time around, their roles were reversed. Now that they had been given a second chance, they became determined to find out.

programme.desc: Mga Agila Sa Arkong Bato

programme.title: Isa, Dalawa, Tatlo, Ang Tatay Kong Kalbo
programme.desc: Medel (Bembol Roco) is a pretty thief who gives his earnings to his neighbors who need it. But hid felonious activities stop when he marries Frieda (Beth Bautista) and adopts Bimbo (Niño Mulach).

programme.title: Sgt. Ernesto Baliola: Tinik Sa Batas
programme.desc: Sgt. Ernesto Baliola: Tinik Sa Batas

programme.title: Wooly Booly 2 (Ang Titser Kong Alien)
programme.desc: The sequel to the succesful Wooly Booly, Ang Classmate Kong Alien. The story continues with Wooly Booly living happily on earth with his human girlfriend. One day, his girlfriend from his planet decides to visit earth with the aim of taking Wooly Booly back home.

programme.title: Bagets 2 (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The Bagets were back bringing with them their new friends for merrier and wackier adventures. This time around, the boys went to the province for their vacation and found loads to laugh about, cry about, be scared about, be sick about, just about everything you could think of.

programme.title: Hiram Na Mukha
programme.desc: Famous plastic surgeon Dr. Hugo (Christopher de Leon) worships the ground his fiancee Alicia (Nanette Medved) walks on. That is because he feels Alicia is his creation.

programme.title: Kulang sa Init, Kulang sa Lamig
programme.desc: Kulang sa Init, Kulang sa Lamig

programme.title: Kanto Boy 2 (Anak ni Totoy Gwapo)
programme.desc: Guiller, the son of the notorious Totoy Guwapo grew up as an orphan. He ended up in prison after accidentally killing a man in a street fight and it was there that he came to terms with life and discovered his own identity.

programme.title: Alyas Baby Tsino (Tatagos sa Puso)
programme.desc: It’s a world where greed and violence is the rule. It’s world where one has to go with the flow in order to survive. And for a man who stick by his guns, it’s worse than hell. He must risk his life and even those he cares for in order for all of them to get out of the dark hole well and alive.

programme.title: Nestor Solis (Hari ng Oxo)
programme.desc: Manila in the 1970's. Society was restless and violence was a way of life. Efren Reyes Jr. is Nestor Solis, a former boxer who was driven by difficult circumstances to a life of crime.

programme.title: Sucker Punch
programme.desc: Close your eyes. Open your mind. You will be unprepared. From the Spartan slaughter of 300 to the visionary world of Watchmen, writer/director/producer Zack Snyder has transported audiences into visual dreamscapes of his creation. His latest cinematic mind trip takes us into the vivid imagination of a young girl (The Uninvited's Emily Browning) whose dream world provides the ultimate escape from her darker institutionalized reality. Unrestrained by the boundaries of time and place, she is free to go where her mind takes her, but her incredible adventures blur the lines between what's real and what is imaginary. Locked away against her will, but determined to fight for her freedom, she and four other girls battle everything from serpents tosamurais on an unbelievable journey to set themselves free. Like "Alice in Wonderland with machine guns," Snyder's epic action fantasy is filmed in such a way that the action sequences aren't limited by physical real...
